citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 p.m. on
22-Jul-19.
Called owner, was unable to accompany inspector on inspection due to previous appointment. Will contact
inspector with optimal hours.
